萓字的基本解释

萓
yí
〔萓莮（
n俷 ）〕同“宜男”，即“萱草”。一种草本植物，花即黄花菜，供食用，根入药。

萓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《集韻》魚羈切，平支，疑。］
(1)宜男草。又名萱草。参见“萱草”。
(2)见“萓葶”。

萓字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　萓； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1041第20
【集韻】魚羈切，音宜。【玉篇】萓莮草卽鹿蔥也。本作宜。

萓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
萓字的起名意思

宜男草。又名萱草。

萓
Basic explanation of words
萓
yí
〔萓莮(
n 俷)] Same as "Yinan", that is, "Hemerocallis". A herbaceous plant, the flower is day lily, for food, the root is used as medicine.
萓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Jiyun" fish cut, flat branch, suspicious. ]
(1) Yinan grass. Also known as Hemerocallis. See "Hemerocallis".
(2) See "萓葶".
萓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　萓; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1041 to 20
[Jiyun] Fish cut, sound is suitable. [Jade articles] Ligustrum grass and deer green onions. This is suitable.
萓
